AxeURL.title: The axe server url to point the extension at
AxeURL.description: Set to full url of your axe DevTools server

UsageServiceURL.title: Usage Service URL endpoint
UsageServiceURL.description: The url of the Usage Service to have data collected and sent to.

UsageServiceOrganization.title: Usage Service Organization
UsageServiceOrganization.description: The organization name to send to the Usage Service.

DataGather.title: Send usage data to the provided usage server
DataGather.description: If set to true, usage data will be collected and sent to our usage server
